resources.string: A note has been added to an existing file
Save a note immediately after voice input
You can also add notes via the \"Share\" menu and widgets.

If a file with the same name already exists, the information will be appended to the end of the existing file.

For example, you can use the following characters to build the date and time template:

yyyy - year
MM - month
dd - day
HH - hour
mm - minute
ss - second

For example, the template "{{yyyy.MM.dd HH_mm_ss}}" will create file names like "2023.04.26 15_30_00.md"
This app needs permission to show notifications in order to quickly add notes.
Add notes without unlocking the screen
This app needs permission to show dialog over lock screen in order to quickly add notes.

To run the function, you need additional permissions:

- On top of other applications
- Show on Lock screen (required on some devices, you need to enable it in the phone settings yourself. Often it is in the "About app" section.)

IMPORTANT: Enabling the "Add notes without unlocking the screen" option may lead to a number of vulnerabilities in the security system of your device. If third parties have access to your phone, they will be able to at least open the keyboard without unlocking the device, and confidential information may be compromised.

Are you sure you want to enable this setting?

To run the function, you need additional permissions:

- On top of other applications
- Show on Lock screen (required on some devices, you need to enable it in the phone settings yourself. Often it is in the "About app" section.)

IMPORTANT: Enabling the "Add notes without unlocking the screen" option may lead to a number of vulnerabilities in the security system of your device. If third parties have access to your phone, they will be able to at least open the keyboard without unlocking the device, and confidential information may be compromised.
Filename template (put date and time formatting patterns inside double curly braces: {{ }})
Use note text beginning in filename
Number of characters from note text beginning to use in filename

To use voice input, you need to allow access to the microphone

How often to show reminders (in minutes)
Write in your diary. What happened? What did you do, how and why? What worries you, what emotions did you experience?
